scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && browserify -t coffeeify --extension=.coffee runtime.coffee | uglifyjs > dist/expressions.js --mangle && cp package.json dist
scripts.build:help: mkdir -p docs/output/help && mkdir -p docs/output/help/expressions/reference && mkdir -p docs/output/help/events/reference && coffee script/generate-help.coffee
scripts.build:dist: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn build:docs && yarn build:help && yarn test
scripts.test: mocha --reporter list --require should --require coffee-coverage/register-istanbul --require coffee-script/register test/**/*.coffee && istanbul report
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf docs/output rm -rf coverage
